name: Plastic Cult
description:
A serious reverse idle-game where you start with all the resources and automations, but slowly lose them one by one.

Help the Plastic Cult reincarnate!

You, your girlfriend Sausage Wrapper, best friend Bleach and grandma Plastic Bag gather under the guidance of High Recyclus. Your goal is to raise awareness in the world and spread knowledge about Reincarnation (a.k.a. recycling) through an online campaign. Click away and you should soon reach your goal.
